meanings.definition: A medication used to treat ulcers and gastroesophageal reflux disease.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed ranitidine to help with my stomach ulcers.
meanings.sent2: Many people find relief from heartburn by taking ranitidine.
meanings.sent3: The ranitidine bottle and I are becoming best friends with all the time we spend together.
meanings.sent4: Taking ranitidine is like having a shield protecting your stomach from acid attacks.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacist explained how ranitidine works by reducing stomach acid production.

meanings.definition: The generic name for the drug Zantac.
meanings.sent1: I asked the pharmacist for the ranitidine instead of the brand name Zantac.
meanings.sent2: Ranitidine is a more affordable option compared to Zantac.
meanings.sent3: My friend thought I was talking about a dinosaur when I mentioned ranitidine.
meanings.sent4: Switching from Zantac to ranitidine felt like changing from a luxury car to a reliable sedan.
meanings.sent5: Remember to check if your medication contains ranitidine if you used to take Zantac.
